com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.documents

Interface DocumentNote


  • public interface DocumentNote
    Represents an instance of a DocumentNoteType that exists on a document. It therefore contains values for some or all of the fields defined by the DocumentNoteType. A document can have maximum one instance of a particular note type.

    ATTENTION: Plugin writers should not implement this interface.
    To get an instance of a DocumentNote use DocumentNoteType.createDocumentNote(). Use DocumentNoteUtilities to access the DocumentNoteTypes.

    For an example of notes in use see documentation for DocumentNoteUtilities

      • setFieldValue

        boolean setFieldValue(String fieldCode,
                    Object value)
        Set a value for a particular field. THIS WILL NOT SAVE CHANGES. AnnotatedPluginDocument.DocumentNotes.setNote(DocumentNote) must be called to save the note to a document.
        Parameters:
        fieldCode - of field to set value
        value - to set or null to clear the value. Must be of correct class specified by DocumentField.getValueType()
        Returns:
        true if value successfully set, false if value did not meet constraints of the field.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if value is not of the class specified by the field's type, if value is not in the set of options for an enumerated field or if the note value contains characters that can't be serialized to XML

      • getFieldValue

        Object getFieldValue(String fieldCode)
        Returns the value of a particular field given the field code.
        Parameters:
        fieldCode - of DocumentNoteField from getFields().
        Returns:
        value of the field or null if none. The class of this is specified by DocumentNoteField.getValueType(). If this is an enumerated field (DocumentNoteField.isEnumeratedField is true) then the class of this value will be String.class.
        See Also:
        DocumentNoteField.getCode(), DocumentNoteField.getValueType()
